items.sentence: Tom has already spent all the money his father left him.
Tom has been trying to get rid of the mice in his house.
Tom helped Mary move the sofa to other side of the room.
This next song is one that people always ask me to sing.
Tom said he\'d had nothing to do with what had happened.
Tom probably doesn\'t want to live on this side of town.
Tom ran into one of his ex-girlfriends at Mary\'s party.
No matter how hard Tom tried, he couldn\'t impress Mary.
I would\'ve done it by myself if Tom hadn\'t been there.
Tom walked out of the store, carrying three large boxes.
